Regulation Name(s): Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad Amplichek I, an assayed quality control material for monitoring nucleic acid detection of HIV-1, HBV, and HCV on molecular diagnostic platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an external assayed quality control material to monitor the performance of in vitro nucleic acid testing procedures for detection of HIV-1, HBV, and HCV; not for use in blood donor screening assays in the US or Canada
